heading: Crisps Media has launched app which enables news distro by AI
desc: In an interview held this saturday in Biratnagar, Anjani Kumar Thakur, spokesperson at Crisps Media announced that the company will be adding sentiment analysis that can enable the user to get a rich experience. We are also planning to link this in a hyperlocal environment to connect users locally with services, Anjani added.

heading: Colorado: Residents return following devastating fire
desc: The fire swept through 6,000 acres in just a few hours, destroying hundreds of homes.One local resident said some families in the area that lost everything and it was a Christmas miracle that nobody was killed.Tens of thousands of people fled as the flames engulfed the area.The fire at its peak was driven by winds of up to 105 mph (169km/h) which caused flames to jump over highways and entire communities, local authorities told Reuters news agency.Climate change increases the risk of the hot, dry weather that is likely to fuel wildfires, and experts say that fires in western North America have grown more intense in recent years.
